select * from ec_info
partner_cname like "%"#{partnerCname}"%"
or partner_cproduct like "%"#{partnerCproduct}"%"
or partner_cregion like "%"#{partnerCregion}"%"
or Partner_cindustry like "%"#{partnerCindustry}"%"
